Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: I don't know what was better, the lovely and friendly staff, the amazing FLAVOURFUL food or the delicious drinks. We had the Trinidad and Tobago tasting platter, the T&T style chicken and wafffles and Caribean Ice Tea. My absolute favoriet was the Maxi Linder cocktail. Highly recommend this fantastic place!

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Super friendly staff..very warm and welcoming. The drinks were tasty, I got the passion fruit lemonade and a cappuccino.  The chicken and waffles OG was also good. My favorite thing about this restaurant was the staff.

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: The restaurant was very nice and the decor was very inviting. Our server was extremely nice and welcoming. My food was pretty good, but my friend who ordered the chicken and waffles had to send her chicken back 2 times because it was not ‚Ä¶

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: We had very good brunch here on saturday, really nice waitress, super tasty chicken and waffles (can heavily recommend), the eggs where fluffy and delicious too. Coffee was also very nice, it's often too acidic, not here, here it's nice and nutty :)

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: This place is amazing with good vibes music and atmosphere! I definitely love it! The food are made with a big heart, and people there are super friendly with customers! I'll going back there for sure indeed! Xxx

Name: Water en Brood

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text:
Delicious breakfast, nothing to complain. Would definitely recommend!
Only thing that was a bit disappointing, was the staff. We were a big group of 15 people and we had made a reservation in advance. ‚Ä¶

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: these were by far the best American pancakes I've ever eaten! the omelette was pretty good too. nice and cosy place, service super friendly. overall highly recommend

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Exquisite !! Awesome staff and very good food. Definitely recommended for breakfast or lunch. ‚Ä¶

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Used their online ordering system at the table (worked quickly and seemlessly) for a delicious shredded bacalao/cod sandwich and iced coffee. Both were perfect.

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Best fried chicken I've had since coming to Europe. The place is small and fills up quickly upon opening - service is a bit slow but worth it.

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text:
Amazing restaurant. The staff and the owner are super friendly, welcoming and the food is AMAZING!
I recommend this restaurant to any person visiting or living in Amsterdam.
PS : they have amazing Caribbean food üç≤

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Quite possibly one of the best brunch spots in Amsterdam,  the food and warmth of the staff is what keeps bringing me back here, fantastic options as well. Still my top pick, followed by Staring at Jacob.

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Great food, great service, we loved everything!! It might get crowded, so a reservation is recommended!

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: nicest service ever! will definetely come back!! the server was super super friendly and the food was perfectly on time.

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Great food, coffee (Lot61) and service. The staff are friendly and conscientious. Some of the best chicken + waffles in Amsterdam! Also recommended are the eggs Benedict, Philly cheese steak, and the pancakes!

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: The food here is absolutely amazing and I love the options of fresh/healthy juices and smoothies.

Name: Water en Brood

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Great sandwiches and lekker plantains. Plenty of great Red Stripes too!

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: The coffee was very good and service excellent, but really not great value for money. 20 euros for an ok breakfast

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Great Staff, Great Vibes, Excellent Food, Music fire!, & this is definitely an establishment to visit more than once!

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Nice place to chill out and relax! The guys that run this are two brothers.... they have a great story about the place - I urge you to pop by and have a chat with them... really lovely comfortable place that welcomes you! ‚Ä¶

Name: Water en Brood

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Not only instagrammable food and a pretty space, but also nice waitresses and delicious breakfast (but a bit more on the pricey side)

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: This is my favorite restaurant in The Netherlands. The food is always fantastic and no matter what I order! Servers are also great and the atmosphere is chill and relaxed. Wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to recommend this place!

Name: Water en Brood

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Such excellent food - the breakfast burrito was amazing (especially with the fried chicken). My friend had the bao buns, also with fried chicken, which was really tasty too. Looking around at the rest of the tables everything else looked ‚Ä¶

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Amazing soul food and super friendly staff! One of my favourite places to hang out. Super busy on the weekends so make sure to reserve a table!

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: This place has a nice decoration. BUT, the fried chicken has sooooo much oil! Really to AVOID. And so expensive, two pieces of  fried chicken plus some scramble eggs and two small piece of waffle, 17 euros, and the service is included, very expensive too... the price is genuinely too high...

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Fantastic food spot. Great options for vegans, vegetarians, meat eaters, and everything in between. Definitely one of the best brunch spots in Amsterdam.  Great service too! Highly recommend.

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Excellent brunch et super service! Top service and great food :-)

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: The burger was delicious. Good food, good staff and good drinks. The ability to order on an app is also a nice feature for when the staff are busy with other tables. Overall I would go again.

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: This place has really good food. It primarily serves brunch and lunch. As an American you can find stuff here you might not expect in Amsterdam. Chicken and waffles for one. In a clever play on words Chicken Bao Down is by far my favorite dish. The staff is awesome,  the cafe is small, casual and you can order for take away.

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Excellent chicken and waffles! The best I've ever had. They had this gin and tonic special that was very worth the price. The staff was great, we're so happy we stepped in for lunch!

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: I really like this place. The vibe is chilled and welcoming and the staff are friendly. Only reason I‚Äôm not giving 5-stars is because the vegetarian options are seriously lacking. However the food we did eat was tasty! A great place for brunch!

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Wonderful food & service. Laid back, trendy atmosphere with a nice outdoor seating area. ‚Ä¶

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: I really enjoyed my lunch here! Portions are generous and you can find also light meals. I work nearby so it's even nicer to have such a spot in this area. In the summer you'll even have the chance to sit outside and enjoy the weather!

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Water & Brood is one of my favourite places to grab a bite to eat in Amsterdam. The food is delicious and reasonably priced, the staff are friendly and attentive and the place itself is cozy and inviting. ‚Ä¶

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Chicken & Waffles were sooo tasty! Fish & Chips sandwich was also very good. Super nice guys own & run the place, good music, laid back vibe. Can‚Äôt wait to go back & try more of their menu. üòã

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: An absolutely amazing place for a lunch in Amsterdam. I live on another side of city but I make sure to often make an effort to come here for a lunch even if it takes longer then your usually neighborhood. Friendly staff as well.

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Pancakes, sausage, bacon ,egg and potato wedges....you would think I never tasted any of these before, and to be honest it felt like I never did. This tasted SO gooooooood. I was cranky when I came in but left with a genuine smile. This food is insanely good!

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Nice decoration but food was below average. Had a falafel salad and Cesar salad. No nice presentation ‚Äî few salad leaves and tomatoes with microwaved falafel.

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: I love this place. The fried chicken bao buns is such a nice dish. Get a ginger shot for a unique experience as well! Servers are always friendly.

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Cool caf√©! We went for breakfast. I had the tastiest chicken, better than KFC or anything I've had in England, probably ever! Music is on point and some cool books and artwork. Would highly recommend!

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: It was okay. I had the OG BENNY (eggs benedict). Edible, but not tasty at all. Bread wasn‚Äôt toasted, almost no avocado, hollandaise sauce tasted like mayonnaise and was over creamy. The salmon came straight from the supermarket around the ‚Ä¶

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Nice place if you need a brake from the touristy part of the city centre. I only had a cappuccino, but it was well made and the food looked good too. The guys who run the place were really friendly.

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: We had chicken and waffles and also the omelet. The chicken was very flavorful and omelette was tasty as well! The Pomegranate gin and ton was nice and tangy!

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: The food was good, and the service is friendly. I had the veggie breakfast roll and my friend had soup. We both got fresh ginger-orange tea.

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: Delicious food and awesome staff!!

Review Text: Best friend chicken waffles in town! If you've never had it before, don't judge it until you try it. The flavors work really well together

Name: Water en Brood
Review Text: People come to Amsterdam to ride bikes and eat here. This place is a no brained, great staff, great food, great music and great eaters. I am move to Amsterdam so I can here more. 100 stars out of 10 stars.

Review Text: Standard fair brunch options. I went with the Greek yogurt, eggs, and toast. Each item was tasty and fresh. Sitting inside is sparse, but they apparently do take reservations.
